extendedInfo.description: New year, new you! Dukan Diet Lite provides dozens of dukan "attack phase" recipes to help you lose weight and to keep it off. Upgrade to the Pro version to unlock all of the diet phases! âââââââââââââââââââââââ "This is not just the best app I have ever come cross but this is the most comprehensive directory of amazing, interesting, fruitful, exciting dukan recipes I have ever come across. I would of paid 100 pounds for this had I know the contents before purchasing. I can tell LOADS of work has gone into this and you are sharing some amazing energy for little. Well well done. Thank you so much." - Michael Todd, Director of the UKH Gro "I love this app! So many recipes!" - Serge Gobachev "Lost two lbs in four days!" - Andrea Ward "Awesome dishes. Even my super picky boyfriend loves them!" - Aja Chism "I bought this app and it's amazing! Just reading the recipes is getting me hungry, yum. It's easy to follow and I'm gonna try one of the beef recipes for lunch. Thnx! I Love it :)" - Jasmine Ogana âââââââââââââââââââââââ The only thing that matters when it comes to diet plans is if it works! Based on over 20 years of research the Dukan Diet is one of the most popular books and diet plans in France. It is a protein-based diet designed by French nutritionist and dietician, Pierre Dukan. The diet consists of 4 phases: attack, cruise, consolidation, and stabilization. The attack phase is designed to enable dieters to rapidly lose 2 to 3 kilograms (4.4 to 6.6 lb) in 2â7 days by kick-starting their metabolism. Dieters are allowed to eat as much as they want of 72 protein-rich foods. The cruise phase is designed to allow dieters to more gradually achieve the weight they aim for by eating protein-rich foods with the addition of 28 specific vegetables. The consolidation phase is designed to help in preventing any future massive weight gain. During this phase, fruit, bread, cheese and starchy foods are reintroduced into a normal diet, leaving two celebratory meals a week as directed by the plan. Finally, in the stabilization phase, dieters can essentially eat whatever they want without gaining weight by following a few lifestyle rules: protein day once a week, eating oat bran every day and making a fitness commitment to "take the stairs". Dieters should follow this last phase for the rest of their life to avoid regaining weight. â Features an elegant and intuitive interface â Over 50 dukan food recipes â Recipes for all meal types including: breakfast, lunch, dinner, snack â Star your favorites for easy reference â Filter menu to sort â Search feature to quickly find your favorite recipe Download Dukan Diet Free and start feeling healthier today!

reviews.comment: These meals sound amazing, you\'ll hardly believe you\'re on a diet....until you see carbs in some of the pictures in this app...even tho the recipe doesn\'t include them...whatever tons of good recipes and ideas !
reviews.author: Keturah Reasoner

reviews.title: Yum
reviews.comment: Good, really good. I only wish I had found this earlier. Am now over half way to my goal, 4 stone down,  just 2 1/2 to go. The new recipes are a great boost.
reviews.author: Anne Shepherd

reviews.title: Terrible.
reviews.comment: There are quite a few recipes that break the rules of the attack phase.  One that struck me was oat bran muffins, which are carbs.  There is a reason you only eat 1.5 tablespoons and not 8 per muffin, which is labelled as an eat all you want.    That, and only attack phase works, everything else is unaccessible or missing.
reviews.author: Richard Webb
